title: We made it to 500 signatures!
description:
Thank you so very much everyone, we made it to 500 signatures!

I am delighted, let's keep up the momentum!

Here's a video of our to beloved Johnny Depp talking about Hunter S. Thompson.

title: Over 200 Supporters! Let's get to 500!
description:
This is great we have over 200 supporters!I

am delighted, let's see if we can get to 500!

And hopefully far beyond that.

Sign and share to show Johnny Depp you're support. 

It isn't appropriate for Discovery to put out this documentary while Johnny Depp is involved in a trial as a victim of domestic violence.
